newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Zurich shares jump in pre-bourse trade.
newsitem.headline: Zurich shares jump in pre-bourse trade.

text.p: Zurich Group shares moved sharply higher in pre-bourse trading on confirmation of rumours that have circulated for weeks that the insurer would link up with U.S. asset manager Scudder, Stevens & Clark, dealers said.
Shares were quoted around 610/615 Swiss francs, up from yesterday's close at 589.
"This was in the air," one dealer said, but news Zurich had beefed up its U.S. business was still received positively.
Huge demand for warrants helped drive the price higher, although turnover in Zurich shares themselves was not very high, another said. -- Zurich newsroom +41 1 631 7340
